projects.title: AI-Powered Security Operations Center (SOC)
projects.overview: A comprehensive security operations platform that uses AI to detect, analyze, and respond to security threats in real-time.
projects.problem: Traditional SOCs suffer from alert fatigue and manual processes. This solution incorporates machine learning to prioritize alerts, detect anomalies, and automate initial response actions.

projects.title: Advanced Malware Analysis Framework
projects.overview: An AI-powered system for automated analysis of malware samples, identifying patterns, behavior, and potential attribution.
projects.problem: Traditional malware analysis is time-consuming and often misses sophisticated evasion techniques. This framework uses machine learning to accelerate analysis and detect novel patterns.

projects.title: Automated Penetration Testing Framework
projects.overview: A comprehensive platform that automates vulnerability scanning, exploitation, and reporting for penetration testing engagements.
projects.problem: Manual penetration testing is time-intensive and can miss vulnerabilities. This solution automates repetitive tasks while allowing security professionals to focus on complex vulnerability analysis.
features: Customizable exploitation modules with safety controls

projects.title: Threat Intelligence Platform
projects.overview: An AI-driven platform that collects, analyzes, and correlates threat data from multiple sources to provide actionable intelligence.
projects.problem: Security teams are overwhelmed with disparate threat data sources. This platform consolidates and enriches threat intelligence, making it actionable for security operations.
features: Automated collection from open and closed sources

projects.title: Secure Network Automation Framework
projects.overview: A security-focused framework for automating network configuration with embedded security controls and compliance verification.
projects.problem: Traditional network automation often neglects security considerations. This solution enforces security best practices in network configurations and monitors for compliance drift.
features: Compliance reporting for major regulatory frameworks

projects.title: Vulnerability Scanner
projects.overview: An automated tool that identifies common security vulnerabilities and misconfigurations in web applications and infrastructure.
projects.problem: Organizations struggle to maintain security as their attack surface expands. This scanner automates the detection of vulnerabilities using pattern matching and behavioral analysis.

projects.title: Cloud Security Posture Management
projects.overview: An automated platform for continuously monitoring and enforcing security policies across multi-cloud environments.
projects.problem: Maintaining security in complex cloud environments is challenging. This solution provides real-time visibility and automated remediation of security issues.
features: Compliance dashboard for major frameworks (SOC 2, HIPAA, PCI DSS)

projects.title: Secure IoT Framework
projects.overview: A comprehensive security framework for IoT devices implementing encryption, secure boot, and continuous monitoring.
projects.problem: IoT devices often lack basic security controls, creating significant attack vectors. This framework enables developers to implement security by design.
features: Anomaly detection for device behavior monitoring

projects.title: Network Intrusion Detection System
projects.overview: An ML-powered system that monitors network traffic to detect and alert on suspicious activities and potential security breaches.
projects.problem: Traditional rule-based intrusion detection systems struggle with novel attack vectors. This solution uses ML to identify anomalous patterns.

projects.title: Adversarial AI Testing Framework
projects.overview: A platform for testing AI model resilience against adversarial attacks and implementing defensive measures.
projects.problem: AI systems are vulnerable to adversarial examples that can cause misclassification. This framework helps identify and mitigate these vulnerabilities.
